content: विभ्रंश् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To drop or fall down. {@--2@} To go to ruin, decay. {@--3@} To fall stray from, go astray. {@--4@} To lose. {@--5@} To disappear, vanish. {@--6@} To fail. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To strike off, knock down. {@--2@} To lead astray, seduce. {@--3@} To destroy, ruin, annihilate. {@--4@} To deprive (one) of.
